column5: I am looking at a couple of Scoty pro pak down riggers. Just wondering if anyone has used them or had any experience with them, of course the seller tells me they are the most trouble free riggers available.
The Scottys are awesome. Tons of power and fast. I like the clutch system for getting the ball down quick.
They work. They are made in Canada. Support our business. 14 years and no issues. (Other than I forgot to plug it in one day, thought it was broke..NOT).
If you don't want them and they are a good deal, I'd be interested in them
sounds good, my issue was thinking when they spool up the cable is going to be all at the bottom of the spool,can t see how it would distribute it up and down the spool. but i guess it does
